name: Baby booties and beanie, pink, photo prop, daisy, baby style
description:
Matching Baby Booties and Beanie. These adorable baby booties are made from wool & rayon felt also known as silk felt. The felt is soft providing warmth and comfort. Each pair of booties is made to order and can be created in any color combination that we have available. 

This set was made for 3 - 6 months, in Pink, more pink, some glitter, some ivory and MORE pink

These booties are offered in sizes for 
newbies ( 0 - 3 months ) or infants ( 3 - 6 months ). 

The newborn size is 3 3/4" Long
The Infant size is 4 1/4" Long

*Custom sizing is available, just provide us with the measurement of the babies foot and add 1/4 to 1/2" for wiggle room

The Matching Beanie is crochet from super soft and stretchy 100% cotton yarn. I love this yarn, it has elastic woven into it, so that everything that you create is super soft, stretchy and comfortable. 

The decorations are sewn on or glued with fabric glue. 

The hat sizing is as follows:

0 - 3 Months (14 - 15")
3 - 6 Months (15 - 16")

*The hat shown is 3 - 6 months
*Larger sizes available upon request

Each item is made to order and we ask that you allow us 5 - 8 business days for completion

Hand wash in cool water and lay flat to dry

Colors are approximate and may be displayed differently on monitors. These colors super hot pink, light pink and pink

name: Girlie baby booties and matching beanie, soft, newborn, photo prop
description:
Girly Whirly Baby Hat and Booties. Matching Baby Booties and Beanie. These adorable baby booties are made from wool & rayon felt also known as silk felt. The felt is soft providing warmth and comfort. Each pair of booties is made to order and can be created in any color combination that we have available. 

These booties are decorated with a light pink felt rose and crochet ruffled circle, glitter

All booties are hand-sewn with embroidery thread, and fabric glue to seal the seams

This set was made for 3 - 6 months

These booties are offered in sizes for 
newbies ( 0 - 3 months ) or infants ( 3 - 6 months ). 

The newborn size is 3 3/4" Long
The Infant size is 4 1/4" Long

*Custom sizing is available, just provide us with the measurement of the babies foot and add 1/4 to 1/2" for wiggle room

The Matching Beanie is crochet from super soft acrylic yarn called rose garden. The beanie has a ruffled brim making it very appealing and will provide sun shade

The decorations are sewn on or glued with fabric glue. 

The hat sizing is as follows:

0 - 3 Months (14 - 15")
3 - 6 Months (15 - 16")

*The hat shown is 3 - 6 months
*Larger sizes available upon request

Each item is made to order and we ask that you allow us 5 - 8 business days for completion

Hand wash in cool water and lay flat to dry

Colors are approximate and may be displayed differently on monitors

name: Adorable Baby Booties with Matching Beanie & Legwarmers
description:
Baby Beanie, Booties and Legwarmers. These adorable baby booties are made from 100% eco-friendly wool felt. The felt is soft and dense providing warmth and comfort. Each pair of booties is made to order and can be created in any color combination that we have available. 

These booties are offered in sizes for 
newbies ( 0 - 3 months ) or infants ( 3 - 6 months ). 

The newborn size is 3 3/4" Long
The Infant size is 4 1/4" Long

*Custom sizing is available, just provide us with the measurement of the babies foot and add 1/4 to 1/2" for wiggle room

The matching legwarmers fit snuggly inside the top of the bootie, and are crochet out of 100% Acrylic Yarn

The Matching Beanie is crochet from super soft and fuzzy acrylic yarn. The decorations are sewn on. The hat sizing is as follows:

0 - 3 Months (14 - 15")
3 - 6 Months (15 - 16")
*Larger sizes available upon request

Each item is made to order and we ask that you allow us 5 - 8 business days for completion

Hand wash in cool water and lay flat to dry

Colors are approximate and may be displayed differently on monitors

The Infant size is 4 1/4" Long

The Matching Beanie is crochet from super soft and stretchy acrylic yarn. I love this yarn, it has elastic woven into it, so that everything that you create is super soft, stretchy and comfortable.

0 - 3 Months (14 - 15")
3 - 6 Months (15 - 16")
